languages.text: Как бы то ни было, сразу после пропажи капитана, нам поступил приказ с подробными инструкциями, обозначавшими бреши в обороне доков, слепые зоны турелей и расположение вражеских патрулей и часовых. Информация была пугающе точной, и никто не знал откуда она взялась. Однако именно благодаря ей второй штурм дока Мю-514 оказался успешным и прошел с минимальными потерями.

The fact, at any rate, is that immediately after the captain's disappearance, we received an order that contained detailed instructions concerning holes in the docks' defences, the blind spots of turrets, and the positions of enemy patrols and sentries. The information was chillingly accurate and no one knew where it had come from. However, it was instrumental in the success of the second assault on Dock Mu-514, which was achieved with minimal casualties.
languages.original_text: Как бы то ни было, сразу после пропажи капитана, нам поступил приказ с подробными инструкциями, обозначавшими бреши в обороне доков, слепые зоны турелей и расположение вражеских патрулей и часовых. Информация была пугающе точной, и никто не знал откуда она взялась. Однако именно благодаря ей второй штурм дока Мю-514 оказался успешным и прошел с минимальными потерями.

The information was chillingly accurate and no one knew where it had come from. However, it was instrumental in the success of the second assault on Dock Mu-514, which was achieved with minimal casualties.

languages.text: 虽然不知道究竟发生了什么事情，但上尉失踪之后，我们立刻接到了一份命令，命令中详细说明了码头防御工事的漏洞、炮塔的盲点，以及敌人的巡逻队与哨兵的位置。这份命令准确得令人不寒而栗，没人知道这些情报究竟是怎么来的。然而，当我们第二次进攻穆-514号船坞时，这些情报发挥了重要作用，我们仅仅以最小的伤亡，就攻破了敌人的防御。
languages.original_text: The fact, at any rate, is that immediately after the captain's disappearance, we received an order that contained detailed instructions concerning holes in the docks' defences, the blind spots of turrets, and the positions of enemy patrols and sentries. The information was chillingly accurate and no one knew where it had come from. However, it was instrumental in the success of the second assault on Dock Mu-514, which was achieved with minimal casualties.

traits.locale_text: 虽然不知道究竟发生了什么事情，但上尉失踪之后，我们立刻接到了一份命令，命令中详细说明了码头防御工事的漏洞、炮塔的盲点，以及敌人的巡逻队与哨兵的位置。这份命令准确得令人不寒而栗，没人知道这些情报究竟是怎么来的。然而，当我们第二次进攻穆-514号船坞时，这些情报发挥了重要作用，我们仅仅以最小的伤亡，就攻破了敌人的防御。

languages.text: Tatsache ist, dass wir unmittelbar nach dem Verschwinden des Captains einen Befehl mit detaillierten Anweisungen zu den Löchern in der Verteidigung der Docks, den toten Winkeln der Geschütze und den Stellungen feindlicher Patrouillen und Wachen erhielten. Die Informationen waren erschreckend präzise, und niemand wusste, woher sie gekommen waren. Sie waren aber entscheidend für den Erfolg des zweiten Angriffs auf Dock Mu-514, der mit minimalen Verlusten über die Bühne ging.
languages.original_text: The fact, at any rate, is that immediately after the captain's disappearance, we received an order that contained detailed instructions concerning holes in the docks' defences, the blind spots of turrets, and the positions of enemy patrols and sentries. The information was chillingly accurate and no one knew where it had come from. However, it was instrumental in the success of the second assault on Dock Mu-514, which was achieved with minimal casualties.

traits.locale_text: Tatsache ist, dass wir unmittelbar nach dem Verschwinden des Captains einen Befehl mit detaillierten Anweisungen zu den Löchern in der Verteidigung der Docks, den toten Winkeln der Geschütze und den Stellungen feindlicher Patrouillen und Wachen erhielten. Die Informationen waren erschreckend präzise, und niemand wusste, woher sie gekommen waren. Sie waren aber entscheidend für den Erfolg des zweiten Angriffs auf Dock Mu-514, der mit minimalen Verlusten über die Bühne ging.

languages.text: En cualquier caso, el hecho es que inmediatamente después de la desaparición del capitán, recibimos órdenes que contenían instrucciones detalladas sobre diversos agujeros en las defensas del puerto, los puntos ciegos de las torretas y las posiciones de las patrullas y centinelas del enemigo. Aquella información era de una precisión escalofriante, y nadie supo de dónde provenía. No obstante, fue la clave del éxito de la segunda ofensiva contra el puerto Mu-514, que se tomó con bajas mínimas.
languages.original_text: The fact, at any rate, is that immediately after the captain's disappearance, we received an order that contained detailed instructions concerning holes in the docks' defences, the blind spots of turrets, and the positions of enemy patrols and sentries. The information was chillingly accurate and no one knew where it had come from. However, it was instrumental in the success of the second assault on Dock Mu-514, which was achieved with minimal casualties.

traits.locale_text: En cualquier caso, el hecho es que inmediatamente después de la desaparición del capitán, recibimos órdenes que contenían instrucciones detalladas sobre diversos agujeros en las defensas del puerto, los puntos ciegos de las torretas y las posiciones de las patrullas y centinelas del enemigo. Aquella información era de una precisión escalofriante, y nadie supo de dónde provenía. No obstante, fue la clave del éxito de la segunda ofensiva contra el puerto Mu-514, que se tomó con bajas mínimas».

languages.text: Quoi qu'il en soit, le fait est qu'immédiatement après que le capitaine a disparu, nous avons reçu des ordres accompagnés d'instructions détaillées concernant les faiblesses dans les défenses des quais, les angles morts des tourelles ainsi que les positions des patrouilles et sentinelles ennemies. Ces informations se sont révélées étrangement exactes, et même si leur source reste un mystère, elles ont contribué à la réussite du second assaut contre le quai Mu-514, qui a fait très peu de victimes dans nos rangs.
languages.original_text: The fact, at any rate, is that immediately after the captain's disappearance, we received an order that contained detailed instructions concerning holes in the docks' defences, the blind spots of turrets, and the positions of enemy patrols and sentries. The information was chillingly accurate and no one knew where it had come from. However, it was instrumental in the success of the second assault on Dock Mu-514, which was achieved with minimal casualties.

traits.locale_text: Quoi qu'il en soit, le fait est qu'immédiatement après que le capitaine a disparu, nous avons reçu des ordres accompagnés d'instructions détaillées concernant les faiblesses dans les défenses des quais, les angles morts des tourelles ainsi que les positions des patrouilles et sentinelles ennemies. Ces informations se sont révélées étrangement exactes, et même si leur source reste un mystère, elles ont contribué à la réussite du second assaut contre le quai Mu-514, qui a fait très peu de victimes dans nos rangs.

languages.text: とにかく、中隊長が姿を消した直後、我々はドックの防御の穴、砲台の死角、敵のパトロールや見張り兵の位置に関する詳細な指示が書かれた命令を受け取った。その情報はゾッとするほど正確で、誰もその出所を知らなかった。しかし、この情報はドックMu-514への2回目の襲撃を最小限の犠牲で成功させるのに役立った。
languages.original_text: The fact, at any rate, is that immediately after the captain's disappearance, we received an order that contained detailed instructions concerning holes in the docks' defences, the blind spots of turrets, and the positions of enemy patrols and sentries. The information was chillingly accurate and no one knew where it had come from. However, it was instrumental in the success of the second assault on Dock Mu-514, which was achieved with minimal casualties.

traits.locale_text: とにかく、中隊長が姿を消した直後、我々はドックの防御の穴、砲台の死角、敵のパトロールや見張り兵の位置に関する詳細な指示が書かれた命令を受け取った。その情報はゾッとするほど正確で、誰もその出所を知らなかった。しかし、この情報はドックMu-514への2回目の襲撃を最小限の犠牲で成功させるのに役立った。

languages.text: O sırada olanlar ise şöyleydi: Komutanın kayboluşunun hemen ardından rıhtım savunmasındaki boşluklar, taretlerin kör noktaları ve devriye gezen düşman nöbetçilerinin konumu hakkında detaylı talimatlar içeren bir emir aldık. İstihbaratın doğruluğu, tüylerimizi diken diken etti. Kimse kaynağını bilmiyordu. Rıhtım Mu-514'e düzenlenen ikinci taarruz, asgari zayiatla sonuçlandı. Bu istihbarat, taarruzun başarısında kilit rol oynamıştı.
languages.original_text: The fact, at any rate, is that immediately after the captain's disappearance, we received an order that contained detailed instructions concerning holes in the docks' defences, the blind spots of turrets, and the positions of enemy patrols and sentries. The information was chillingly accurate and no one knew where it had come from. However, it was instrumental in the success of the second assault on Dock Mu-514, which was achieved with minimal casualties.
